title: European Film Distribution
description:
Identifier: CREA-MEDIA-2024-FILMDISTPillar: -Opening Date: Deadline: Thu, 25 Apr 2024 17:00:00 (Brussels local time)Modification Date: Fri, 15 Dec 2023Latest information: Corrected link (please copy and paste into your browser if you still experience a problem)
Follow this link for the list of national correspondents to certify admissions for the territory/ies declared in your MEDIA database admissions dossier:
https://www.eacea.ec.europa.eu/document/download/87204bc1-2f48-4c84-9335-1efb440f7103_en?filename=National%20correspondents%20CREA-MEDIA-2024-FILMDIST.pdf

 
You should have your admissions certified and signed for each territory declared, using the ‘Certified admissions’ template (also available on the call page and under “Download Part B template” when creating a draft proposal. 
Please clearly indicate ‘Creative Europe MEDIA European Film Distribution 2024 call for proposals- Request for certification of admissions’ in your email/communication.
Once admissions have been certified, upload the document as a pdf file in the draft Proposals area. Do not add a password protection, as this will be refused in the submission system.

description:
Identifier: CREA-CULT-2023-LITPillar: -Opening Date: Deadline: Tue, 7 Mar 2023 17:00:00 (Brussels local time)Modification Date: Tue, 14 Feb 2023Latest information: We have been notified of a configuration issue in the budget table (“Tpl_Detailed Budget table (CREA LSII)”) which means that the calculation for partial months (eg 2,4 or 3,7) are not calculated accurately in the detailed budget tabs (BEXXX), as they are systematically rounded up or down.
As a result, applicants can use either person days or person months to complete the detailed budget tables, and they must include in the “Any comments” tab a detailed explanation of the approach they have adopted.

title: Circulation of European literary works
description:
Identifier: CREA-CULT-2021-LITPillar: -Opening Date: Deadline: Thu, 30 Sep 2021 17:00:00 (Brussels local time)Modification Date: Thu, 8 Jul 2021Latest information: Please note that we have just published a corrigendum for this Call, we invite you to have a look, especially if your organisation is not active in the publishing and book sector.
An eligibility criterion has been added mentioning that to be eligible the applicant organisation must be active in the publishing and book sector. The corrigendum concerns also footnotes which were missing or incomplete but nothing substantial.
